designations.purpose: Primary execution with real-world intent (repo/workspace changes, deployments, enforcement actions).
constraints: Honor SEAM ordering: Security > Efficiency > Awareness > Minimalism.
Never log secrets; use environment variables for credentials.

designations.purpose: Verification and validation (tests, reproduction, confirmation of behavior).
constraints: If changes are required, keep them minimal and evidence-driven.

designations.purpose: Simulation / what-if reasoning with no production impact.
constraints: Must not perform real deployments or irreversible actions.
Outputs must be clearly labeled as simulation/estimates.

designations.purpose: Incident response and recovery (stabilize, restore, and rebuild).
constraints: Prefer reversible operations and document evidence paths.
Use archive/restore workflows rather than delete.

designations.purpose: Audit and observation (inventory, compliance snapshots, discrepancy reports).
constraints: Avoid scanning recursive/generated namespaces unless explicitly authorized (e.g., logs/, semantics_vault/).

designations.purpose: Policy/guardrail enforcement (pairing rules, secret hygiene, safety invariants).
constraints: Only apply fixes when explicitly in fix/remediation mode.
Keep policy-impacting edits minimal and traceable.
